AnnotationList Class.

Source: R/AnnotationList.R
AnnotationList.Rd

Generate and process an Java ArrayList with Annotation objects.

Public fields

obj

rJava object

Methods

Public methods

  • AnnotationList$new()

  • AnnotationList$as.data.table()

  • AnnotationList$clone()

Method new()

Initialize AnnotationPipeline

Usage

AnnotationList$new(x)

Arguments

x

A character vector with text documents.

Method as.data.table()

Parse annotation output and return data.table.

Usage

AnnotationList$as.data.table()

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

AnnotationList$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

if (getOption("bignlp.corenlp_dir") == "") corenlp_install(lang = NULL)

docs <- c("Das ist das erste Dokument.", "Ein weiteres Dokument!")
annoli <- AnnotationList$new(docs)
Pipe <- AnnotationPipeline$new()
Pipe$annotate(annoli)
#> ... create Java Annotation objects
#> ... annotate it
annoli$as.data.table()
#>     doc_id idx     word lemma pos ner headidx deprel
#>  1:      1   1      Das     _   _   _       _      _
#>  2:      1   2      ist     _   _   _       _      _
#>  3:      1   3      das     _   _   _       _      _
#>  4:      1   4    erste     _   _   _       _      _
#>  5:      1   5 Dokument     _   _   _       _      _
#>  6:      1   6        .     _   _   _       _      _
#>  7:      2   1      Ein     _   _   _       _      _
#>  8:      2   2 weiteres     _   _   _       _      _
#>  9:      2   3 Dokument     _   _   _       _      _
#> 10:      2   4        !     _   _   _       _      _
